articles.title: Australia senator condemned for burka stunt in parliament - BBC
articles.description: Pauline Hanson donned a black burka as she sought to push for a ban on the garment.
articles.content:
An Australian senator has provoked anger for wearing a burka in parliament, after pushing for a ban on the Muslim garment.
Pauline Hanson was condemned by fellow senators, with one accusing her of "… [+1638 chars]

articles.author: Lexy Perez
articles.title: Ariana Grande Red Carpet Grabber Deported, Banned From Singapore - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The Australian was initially charged with “being a public nuisance” and sentenced to nine days in prison after the incident.
articles.content:
After being arrested and charged in Singapore, the man who rushed and grabbed Ariana Grande on the Wicked: For Good red carpet last week has been deported and banned from the country.
